articles.content: The S&P 500s technology sector just ended its worst week since early September, after Chinese artificial-intelligence company DeepSeek seemed to startle investors perception of winners and losers… [+388 chars]

articles.title: FDA approves first non-opioid pain medicine in more than 20 years - Ars Technica
articles.description: The drug, Journavx (suzetrigine), inhibits an ion channel in peripheral nerves.
